name: Wind Peaks
summary:
In a place called Wind Peaks, mysteries happen, help the scout crew find the missing objects in this fun and relaxing adventure.

Wind Peaks is a searching game, with distinct hand draw cartoonish visuals, telling the story of a group of scouts that finds a map that guides them to a magical part of the forest.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: PUZ
  • 游玩人数: 单人
  • 发行日期: 2020年7月29日
  • 官方网站: http://www.windpeaks.com/
